alert.note: Alert for Banks; Barrow; Hall; Jackson; Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:22PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Barrow, southern Banks, east central Hall, Jackson and west central Madison Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 122 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Pendergrass, or near Jefferson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Homer, Braselton, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Gillsville, Talmo, Peach State Speedway, Chateau Elan, Apple Valley and Banks Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
